blogPost.excerpt: 🖤 Blanc is the one and only full-face mask to protect your eyes, nose and mouth from the outside world, make sure you breathe fresh and clean air thanks to its 2 high-efficiency HEPA filters. Keep your identity safe and fit your outfit.
blogPost.body: 🖤 Blanc is the one and only full-face mask to protect your eyes, nose and mouth from the outside world, make sure you breathe fresh and clean air thanks to its 2 high-efficiency HEPA filters. Keep your identity safe and fit your outfit.
blogPost.title: Blanc Mask - Your full-face modular mask with HEPA filters
blogPost.author: Norayr Margarian

localize.description: 🖤Blanc是唯一一款也是唯一一款保护您的眼睛、鼻子和嘴巴免受外界影响的全脸面膜，它的2个高效过滤器确保您呼吸到清新干净的空气。保护好你的身份，穿上合适的衣服。
localize.tagline: 您的带有高效空气过滤器的全脸模块化面罩

localize.description: 🖤Blanc是唯一一款也是唯一一款保護您的眼睛、鼻子和嘴巴免受外界影響的全臉面膜，它的2個高效過濾器確保您呼吸到清新幹淨的空氣。保護好你的身份，穿上合適的衣服。
localize.tagline: 您的帶有高效空氣過濾器的全臉模塊化面罩

next.excerpt: Podpage makes it easy to create a podcast website with just a few clicks. Every page is optimized to be found on Google and stays up-to-date forever. No technical knowledge necessary.
next.title: Podpage - Build a podcast website in less than 5 minutes.

localize.description: Podpage使得只需点击几下即可轻松创建播客网站。每个页面都经过优化，可以在Google上找到，并且永远保持最新。不需要技术知识。
localize.tagline: 在不到5分钟的时间内建成一个播客网站。

localize.description: Podpage使得只需點擊幾下即可輕鬆創建播客網站。每個頁面都經過優化，可以在Google上找到，並且永遠保持最新。不需要技術知識。
localize.tagline: 在不到5分鐘的時間內建成一個播客網站。
